summary: The pricing strategy is based on a competitive and affordable unit price of â‚¬24.00, ensuring a high volume of sales and market penetration. The growth projections are aligned with the increasing awareness and demand for sustainable products among the younger demographic. Market saturation is anticipated to be gradual, with a consistent increase in unit sales year over year. The pricing strategy remains stable over time to maintain competitiveness against similar products and to reinforce the premium yet accessible positioning of the BMW EcoHydrate.
methodology: The data sources include market analysis reports on the smart water bottle industry, BMW's internal financial projections, and historical data on similar product launches. Assumptions are based on the projected growth of the sustainability market and the increasing adoption of smart technology among students.

comparable_projects.name: LARQ Smart Bottle
comparable_projects.description: A self-cleaning water bottle using UV-C LED technology to eliminate bacteria and viruses.

comparable_projects.name: HydraSpark Pro
comparable_projects.description: A smart water bottle with real-time sensor and app alerts for hydration tracking.
